C

CalcButton - Class in com.gmail.mohitsainiknl2.mscalculator.handler.gui
CalcButton class used to design buttons specially for MSCalculator by extending the JButton class of the JavaSE and with the help of style and theme.
CalcButton(String, ButtonType, Style, Theme) - Constructor for class com.gmail.mohitsainiknl2.mscalculator.handler.gui.CalcButton
This constructor of CalcButton is point where this class initialize its field and distributing the field-values according to the button type, with the help of the argument passed as the parameter.
CalcField - Class in com.gmail.mohitsainiknl2.mscalculator.handler.gui
CalcField class used to set-up the JTextField according to the MSCalculator.
CalcField(String, Theme) - Constructor for class com.gmail.mohitsainiknl2.mscalculator.handler.gui.CalcField
This constructor is used to set-up initial field of the JTextField, with the help of parameters.
calculate(String, String) - Method in class com.gmail.mohitsainiknl2.mscalculator.handler.event.CalcUtilities
calculate method of this class help to prepare the number to before pushing it to the Calculator class to calculate the result.
calculate(BigDecimal, BigDecimal, char) - Static method in class com.gmail.mohitsainiknl2.mscalculator.handler.event.Calculator
this calculate method perform the operation on the BigDecimal only, and return the result in the String format.
calculate(BigInteger, BigInteger, char) - Static method in class com.gmail.mohitsainiknl2.mscalculator.handler.event.Calculator
this calculate method perform the operation on the BigIntegers only, and return the result in the String format.
calculateAndSetNum(char) - Method in class com.gmail.mohitsainiknl2.mscalculator.handler.event.CalcUtilities
calculateAndSetNum method perform the calculation of all the operator button, according to the operator passed to it.
calculateResult(String, String) - Method in class com.gmail.mohitsainiknl2.mscalculator.handler.event.CalcUtilities
This calculateResult method is a special purpose method, use to perform the calculation.
calculateResult(String, String, char) - Method in class com.gmail.mohitsainiknl2.mscalculator.handler.event.CalcUtilities
This calculateResult method help in preparing and calling the Calculator class method to perform calculation.
Calculator - Class in com.gmail.mohitsainiknl2.mscalculator.handler.event
Calculator class is the core class of MSCalculator, which actually perform the arithmetic operations.

changeSign(String, CalcField) - Static method in class com.gmail.mohitsainiknl2.mscalculator.handler.event.FormatUtilities
changeSign method change the sign of the number, it change -ve into +ve and +ve into -ve.
